item.title: Help :\

item.description:
@Fillost wrote:

I Was wondering if there is a code I could put in a simple game that when you click somewhere a picture follows (I’m noob at development)
I’m thinking something like this

<div id="sketch"></div> <img src="cat.jpg" class="follow" style="position: absolute;"/>
